qa.name: Luna
qa.essence: Nature-loving, empathetic girl with telepathic abilities
qa.appearance: Petite with long, flowing hair and bright eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the whispers of the forest, I found a language all my own.
json_to_edit.description: Luna communicates telepathically with various animals in a lush forest setting.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Rustling leaves, bird calls, gentle breeze
json_to_edit.name: Forest Whispers
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Young Luna demonstrates her ability to communicate telepathically with forest animals.

qa.action: Luna stands in a sunlit clearing, surrounded by various forest animals.

hf.action: Luna approaches a curious deer, her eyes locked with the animal's.

tr.action: Luna's eyes glow slightly as she initiates telepathic communication.

xc.action: From Luna's perspective, we see the deer's thoughts visualized as soft, colorful waves.

ka.action: Luna kneels down, surrounded by small woodland creatures drawn to her presence.

fn.action: Luna smiles warmly as she mentally converses with a playful squirrel on her shoulder.

af.sfx_keywords: harmonious animal sounds, wind in trees
af.action: As the sun sets, Luna stands at the edge of the clearing, bidding farewell to her animal friends.

edit_command: Add a new establishing shot before each existing shot, showing the surrounding forest environment. Don't change anything else.
